New Records: Andre Russell took his 50th T20 international wicket
Roston Chase hit his fourth T20 century
Key Match Events: West Indies successfully chased down a target of 137 runs
Early wobble for West Indies with two early wickets
Chase and Russell calmed West Indies' fears
Post-Match Reflections: Roston Chase expressed pride in the team's performance
Papua New Guinea captain Assad Vala praised his team's effort
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match marked the start of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 for the co-hosts West Indies
